com.parkingtycoon.models

Class BluePrintModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.models.BaseModel
      • com.parkingtycoon.models.BluePrintModel

  • public class BluePrintModel
extends BaseModel
    A BluePrint contains all the information that can be used to build a building

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BluePrintModel.Builder
      Builders should create a Building on a given position
      static interface  BluePrintModel.Demolisher
      Demolishers can take action when a building is removed

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluePrintModel

        public BluePrintModel(java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String uiImagePath,
                      java.lang.String spritePath,
                      float spriteOriginX,
                      float spriteOriginY,
                      float price,
                      java.util.EnumSet<FloorModel.FloorType> canBuildOn,
                      FloorModel.FloorType[][] tiles,
                      BluePrintModel.Builder builder,
                      boolean buildOnAllFloors,
                      BluePrintModel.Demolisher demolisher,
                      int... allowedAngles)
        This constructor will create a new BluePrint
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the building
        description - Description of the building
        uiImagePath - Path to the image that is shown in the Build/Catalogue-Window
        spritePath - Path to the ghost-sprite that is shown while choosing a position to build
        spriteOriginX - X-coordinate of the center of the sprite
        spriteOriginY - Y-coordinate of the center of the sprite
        price - Price of this building
        canBuildOn - FloorTypes that this building is allowed to stand on (CONCRETE for example)
        tiles - FloorTypes that will be placed underneath the building
        builder - The builder should build the building
        buildOnAllFloors - If true, the building will appear on each floor. Like elevators
        demolisher - Action that is performed when demolishing
        allowedAngles - In which angles is this building allowed to be built? (min 0, max 3)
